meanings.sent1: The small plant surviving in the harsh desert was an improbably sight.
meanings.sent2: It is improbably that it will snow in the middle of summer.
meanings.sent3: The penguin trying to fly was an improbably funny sight.
meanings.sent4: Her dream of becoming a mermaid was as improbably as finding a pot of gold at the end of a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The cat wearing a hat was an improbably adorable image.

meanings.definition: In a way that is unlikely to occur.
meanings.sent1: She improbably managed to finish the race despite starting late.
meanings.sent2: The ball bounced improbably high into the air.
meanings.sent3: The magician improbably made the elephant disappear with a wave of his wand.
meanings.sent4: The news of the treasure map spread through the town improbably fast.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship landed on the alien planet improbably smoothly.
